document.title: Document
document.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.
document.noDocuments: No documents in this folder. Create your first one!
document.viewOnlyAccessMessage: You have viewer permissions for this document. You can read and run procedures, but cannot make changes.
document.statusChangePermission: Only owners and editors can change status
document.editPermissionDenied: You do not have permission to edit this document. Only owners and editors can make changes.
document.statusChangePermissionDenied: You do not have permission to change document status. Only owners and editors can make changes.
document.documentPublished: Document published successfully! Steps are now searchable.

stepEditor.failedToSaveImage: Failed to save edited image. Please try again.
stepEditor.failedToUpdateVideo: Failed to update step with video

auth.checkEmail: Check your email for the magic link!

workspace.selectWorkspaceMessage: Workspaces help you organize your documents. Create your first workspace to get started!

workspace.workspaceLimitReached: Workspace limit reached ({current}/{limit}). Please upgrade your plan.

permissions.viewOnlyMessage: You have viewer permissions for this document. You can read and run procedures, but cannot make changes.
permissions.editorRequired: Editor role required to make changes
permissions.accessDenied: Access denied: Not a member of this workspace

notifications.draftMode: This document is not published. Steps won't appear in search results. Change status to "Published" above to make it searchable.
notifications.archivedMode: This document is archived and won't appear in search results.
notifications.published: Document published successfully! Steps are now searchable.
